author: Mo Quan
synopsis: Qin Yao, a disciple of the immortal sect, was seriously injured and fainted during a mission. When he woke up, he found that he was mistaken for a disciple of the demonic sect and was rescued. In order to survive, Qin Yao had to disguise himself as a demon disciple and quietly seek a way to escape back to the immortal sect. However, the demon clan is not so easy to mix in!
